teststorydesc: The provider enters immunization data from a pharmacy as reported by the parent for Juana Mariana Gonzales.
preCondition: The EMR has recorded all of the pediatric demographic data  in the record created for Juana Mariana Gonzales.
postCondition: The immunization history from the pharmacy as reported by the parent is loaded into the record created for Juana Mariana Gonzales.
testObjectives: Record Past Immunizations: The EHR or other clinical software system allows providers to enter information about immunizations given elsewhere (e.g., by another doctor, at a public health clinic, pharmacy, etc.) with incomplete details.
evaluationCriteria:
